creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The classpath file has the line:

<classpathentry kind="var" 
       path="TOMCAT_LIBS_BASE/tomcat7-deps/dbcp/tomcat-dbcp.jar" sourcepath="/TOMCAT_LIBS_BASE/tomcat6-deps/dbcp/src/java"/>

AFAICT, this is not needed, as Eclipse does not complain when it is removed.

If it is needed, then at least the same version of Tomcat should be referenced.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Eclipse files were deleted from SVN so problem has gone away
